channel.title: IkramScape, clean, stable framework
channel.description:
[b]Ikramscape[/b]
Ive recently decided to make my own base, it's a scratch base, which is very stable, packaged and easy to use for begginer programmers. The Base consits of (brocken) down class files, i havent made a messy job, but made it nice and simple to work with. The framework is very unique, it dosent eat much processes at all.
This base was inspired by RuneFusion, i wanted to make a similar framework to blakes i thought the utility was great. I havnt done much to IkramScape yet, ive basically wrote this from a very, very old winterlove server. The server is very clean.
Update log:
[code] - Login - Rendering - Walking - Handler for every packet - New logging methods. - Now uses ThreadGroup to reduce lag(hopefully) - Public Chat - Tabs Added - Action Buttons Handler Finished - Player Commands added - Item in Inventory and item command - Camera Angel handled - Mouse Clicks handled - Focus Change handled - Idle Packets handled - Item Dropping added - Item Picking up added - Able to Add/Remove Objects/Walls(LoadGlobals packet) - Added coords command[/code]
What's to be added: [code] - Wield Equipment - Remove Equipment - Send Stat Levels - Send Exp Amounts - Send Combat Levels - Log Out - Prayer Clicking Handled - Teleport Button Clicking Handled9Normal Magic) - NPC's Added - PacketOrganizer added[/code]
[b]Credits: _ikram, Blakeman, Palidino76[/b]

item.title: IkramScape, clean, stable framework
item.dc:creator: @Efilite Efilite
item.description:
@Efilite wrote:

[quote="_ikram, post:7, topic:282116"][quote author=Efilite link=topic=372764.msg2813214#msg2813214 date=1244130487]
I’m glad you are doing this, recently I have released a stable packaged server and all of a sudden a lot of people are starting to do the same.

I’ll let you know some thing I have trouble with, it was the player saving and rendering, this was one difficult task.
[/quote]

i found the rendiering the easiest, my login method sucks a bit though, i’m fixing it up.

Player saving is easy aswell, i used WinterLove’s and modifyed it a lot

@Si Force - Thank’s mate[/quote]
Anyway good luck hope it goes well.

Read full topic

item.title: IkramScape, clean, stable framework
item.dc:creator: @_ikram _ikram
item.description:
@_ikram wrote:

Ikramscape

Ive recently decided to make my own base, it’s a scratch base, which is very stable, packaged and easy to use for begginer programmers.
The Base consits of (brocken) down class files, i havent made a messy job, but made it nice and simple to work with.
The framework is very unique, it dosent eat much processes at all.

This base was inspired by RuneFusion, i wanted to make a similar framework to blakes i thought the utility was great.
I havnt done much to IkramScape yet, ive basically wrote this from a very, very old winterlove server.
The server is very clean.

Update log:

[code]

  • Login
  • Rendering
  • Walking
  • Handler for every packet
  • New logging methods.
  • Now uses ThreadGroup to reduce lag(hopefully)
  • Public Chat
  • Tabs Added
  • Action Buttons Handler Finished
  • Player Commands added
  • Item in Inventory and item command
  • Camera Angel handled
  • Mouse Clicks handled
  • Focus Change handled
  • Idle Packets handled
  • Item Dropping added
  • Item Picking up added
  • Able to Add/Remove Objects/Walls(LoadGlobals packet)
  • Added coords command[/code]

What’s to be added:

[code] - Wield Equipment

  • Remove Equipment
  • Send Stat Levels
  • Send Exp Amounts
  • Send Combat Levels
  • Log Out
  • Prayer Clicking Handled
  • Teleport Button Clicking Handled9Normal Magic)
  • NPC’s Added
  • PacketOrganizer added[/code]

Credits: _ikram, Blakeman, Palidino76
